Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.9 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.9.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.9.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.9.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
281.
3012Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava, vipāke nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
3013Anulomaṃ.
